title: A Szeg\H{o} Limit Theorem for Radially-Compressed Toeplitz Operators
abstract:
We obtain Szeg\H{o}-type Limit Theorems in the setting of Reproducing Kernel
Hilbert Spaces on discs in $\mathbb{C}$. From this, we derive a formula for the
density of the eigenvalues of compressions of Toeplitz operators. Examples for
the Bergman and Segal-Bargmann-Fock space are also presented.
